statements: DELETE FROM compliance_reports WHERE company_name = 'ABC Inc'
DELETE FROM compliance_reports WHERE compliance_status = FALSE
DELETE FROM compliance_reports WHERE company_name = 'Example Company' AND compliance_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM compliance_reports WHERE industry_standard = 'ISO 9001' AND compliance_status = FALSE;
DELETE FROM compliance_report WHERE company_id IN (SELECT id FROM company WHERE industry = 'IT');
DELETE FROM Companies WHERE company_id IN (SELECT company_id FROM Companies WHERE industry = 'IT');
DELETE FROM ComplianceLogs WHERE report_id IN (SELECT report_id FROM ComplianceReports WHERE compliance_status = FALSE);
DELETE FROM violations WHERE description LIKE '%violation%';
DELETE FROM reports WHERE date < '2021-01-01' AND submitted = FALSE;
